prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with powerful arms and a tough exterior for an urban environment.
I want a fighting-type Pokemon that excels in physical combat and has a mischievous personality.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a scrappy fighter, with unique traits and colors.
Make a medium-sized Pokemon with a muscular build and distinct features for battles in forests.
Imagine a fierce but playful Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats and loves to spar.
Design a Pokemon that showcases an aggressive stance with notable movement and color patterns.
Give me a detailed concept for a Pokemon skilled in both martial arts and urban survival.
